Name: Freud
Review Text: Really good food and refreshing service from a team that "guides people with psychological vulnerabilities". I loved it, and will definitely be back.

Name: Freud
Review Text:
Not many options in the menu, not a super friendly service and a bit overpriced in my opinion.
Nice location though, I especially liked to eat outside.

Name: Freud
Review Text: Food was delicious, nice location and good price for the quality offered. And finally a great concept. We will be back!

Name: Freud
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Nice way to see Amsterdam and the city. Visited from Canada. Had the sardines as the appetizer and were delicious!

Review Text: Really nice restaurant. Amazing food, good service. No pretense but simply awesome.

Name: Freud
Review Text: Enjoyed the food really well, everything was done to perfection. The only improvement would be the cooking oil for fries. Fries had a taste of another food so that experience was not great, but it is so easy to fix. Keep the good work!

Name: Freud
Review Text: Had the best dinner here during our stay in Amsterdam. Every dish was delicious and the waitress offered a great wine suggestion for our meal. Staff were super friendly and welcoming.
